meanings.definition: A sterol found in plants that is structurally similar to cholesterol.
meanings.sent1: The phytosterol in the plant helps it stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Many people consume phytosterol supplements for their health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The phytosterol in the salad decided to throw a party for the other nutrients.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the phytosterol in the sunflower.
meanings.sent5: The phytosterol stood out among the other plant compounds like a star in the sky.

meanings.definition: A compound that may help lower cholesterol levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Including phytosterol-rich foods in your diet can be beneficial for your heart.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend phytosterol supplements to patients with high cholesterol.
meanings.sent3: The phytosterol in the blood high-fived the other nutrients for their teamwork.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the effect of phytosterol on cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent5: The phytosterol worked tirelessly to keep the cholesterol levels in check, like a guardian angel.
